= ActsAsTaggable

== Installation

1. Install the plugin.

 $ ./script/plugin install git://

2. Put the class methods 'acts_as_item' inside the model and the controller of the object you want to get taggable.

3. Add the members 'add_tag' and 'remove_tag' to the resources defining the routes linked to your object.

 $ map.resources :object, :member => { :add_tag => :any, :remove_tag => :any }

4. Define the fields in the views and linked it to the good urls.
